title: Friends
description: Follow the lives of six reckless adults living in Manhattan, as they indulge in adventures which make their lives both troublesome and happening.

title: Breaking Bad
description: Walter White, a chemistry teacher, discovers that he has cancer and decides to get into the meth-making business to repay his medical debts. His priorities begin to change when he partners with Jesse.

title: The Boys
description: Superheroes are often as popular as celebrities, as influential as politicians, and sometimes even as revered as gods. But that's when they're using their powers for good. What happens when the heroes go rogue and start abusing their powers?

title: Brooklyn 99
description: Ray Holt, an eccentric commanding officer, and his diverse and quirky team of odd detectives solve crimes in Brooklyn, New York City.

title: Suits
description: A college dropout, Mike Ross, possesses immense competence. A set of circumstances leads to him effectively working as a law associate for Harvey Specter despite not having gone to law school.

title: Mr. Robot
description: Elliot, a cyber-security engineer suffering from anxiety, works for a corporation and hacks felons by night. Panic strikes him after Mr Robot, a cryptic anarchist, recruits him to ruin his company.

title: That 70's Show
description: Eric, a high school student, and his group of teenage friends struggle to lead purposeful lives whilst going through the tumultuous phase of adolescence.

title: Prison Break
description: Michael Scofield finds himself in the Ogygia Prison in Sana'a, Yemen, seven years after his apparent death. His friends, brother and fellow escapee do everything it takes to bring him home.
